label: Valerio, Alejandro A., Josephine J. Rodriguez, James B. Whitfield & Daniel H. Janzen.  2005. Prasmodon zlotnicki, a new Neotropical species of the genus Prasmodon Nixon (Braconidae: Microgastrinae) from Costa Rica, with the first host records for the genus. Zootaxa 1016: 29-38.
